# ETL

## Load libraries

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(rstatix)
library(tidyquant)
```

## Load data

We use a indexed read mode for create a list with multiples data.frames.

```{r}
file_paths <- fs::dir_ls("/home/fredvasconcelos/Documentos/educacao/alunos/2009_2021/")

listed_df_cursos <- file_paths %>%
  map(function (path) {
    read.csv(path, sep = ';', encoding = 'latin1')
  }) %>%
  tibble() 

```

## Create merged data.frame

```{r}
cursos <- listed_df_cursos %>%
  unnest(cols = '.')
```
